mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, TA.* FROM ( SELECT D.DRAWING_NO, D.DRAWING_ROUND, D.MEMBER_NO, D.DRAWING_MEMBER_NO, D.DRAWING_MEMBER_NAME, D.DRAWING_START_DATE, D.DRAWING_END_DATE, D.DRAWING_CREDATE, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM DRAWING D JOIN MEMBER M ON D.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
ORDER BY D.DRAWING_NO DESC ) TA ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM DRAWING D

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.AUTHORITY != 1 AND B.BOARD_CREDATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.BOARD_CREDATE <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{no}

SELECT DRAWING_NO, DRAWING_ROUND, MEMBER_NO, DRAWING_MEMBER_NO, DRAWING_MEMBER_ID, DRAWING_MEMBER_NAME, DRAWING_START_DATE, DRAWING_END_DATE, DRAWING_CREDATE FROM ( SELECT DRAWING_NO, DRAWING_ROUND, MEMBER_NO, DRAWING_MEMBER_NO, DRAWING_MEMBER_ID, DRAWING_MEMBER_NAME, DRAWING_START_DATE, DRAWING_END_DATE, DRAWING_CREDATE FROM DRAWING ORDER BY DRAWING_CREDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DRAWING (DRAWING_NO, DRAWING_ROUND, MEMBER_NO, DRAWING_PERSONNEL, DRAWING_MEMBER_NO, DRAWING_MEMBER_ID, DRAWING_MEMBER_NAME, DRAWING_START_DATE, DRAWING_END_DATE, DRAWING_CREDATE) VALUES (DRAWING_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{drawingRound}, #{memberNo}, #{drawingPersonnel}, #{drawingMemberNo}, #{drawingMemberId}, #{drawingMemberName}, #{drawingStartDate}, #{drawingEndDate}, SYSDATE)
